info.name: Adamant HR - Full API Collection
info.description: Admin auth is via Firebase only. Run 'Get Firebase ID Token (Admin)' first: sign in with your admin email/password via Firebase Auth REST API. The idToken is saved to admin_token. Use it for all admin-protected requests. Set firebase_api_key (from Firebase Console → Project Settings → General → Web API Key), admin_email, and admin_password in collection variables.

request.description: Sign in via Firebase Auth REST API. Uses admin_email and admin_password. Saves idToken to admin_token for use in admin-protected requests. Get firebase_api_key from Firebase Console → Project Settings → General → Web API Key.
Verify the Firebase ID token with the backend. Run after 'Get Firebase ID Token (Admin)'. Returns uid, email, role if token is valid and user has admin access (allowed domain + role).

formdata.value: Finding leadership for tomorrow's market leaders through discreet global searches.

request.description: Add a new service. Requires admin authentication. Upload image file.
Get all services. No authentication required.
Get a single service by ID. No authentication required.
Update a service. Requires admin authentication. Image is optional.
Delete a service. Requires admin authentication.

Add or update multiple industries in one request. Requires admin authentication. Send JSON body with industries array. Each item: name (required), description, list (array of strings), image (optional - path like 'industry/information-technology.png' for frontend static images). Existing industries (by name) are updated; new ones are added. Images are stored in frontend public/images/industry/.

formdata.value: Recruitment expertise for tech and product roles across startups and enterprises.

request.description: Add a new industry. Requires admin authentication. 'list' should be a JSON array string.
Get all industries. No authentication required.
Get a single industry by ID. No authentication required.

formdata.description: Optional: Upload new image file (use Choose Files)
Optional: Set image path without upload. Use 'industry/xxx.png' for frontend static images in public/images/industry/. Overridden by image file if both provided.

request.description: Update an industry. Requires admin authentication. Image: (1) Upload file via 'image' field, or (2) Set 'imagePath' to use frontend static image (e.g. industry/information-technology.png). Frontend images are in hr-frontend/public/images/industry/.
Delete an industry. Requires admin authentication.
